title: B-class Adventurer, Expelled Adventurer, Let’s Hear Your Stories - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Fantasy World   Friendship   Inferiority Complex   Male Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Short Story
author: Oka / Okano Yuu   丘/丘野　優
description:
One day, Reg, a B-class adventurer, is drinking in a tavern when he hears a conversation behind him that he doesn't like to hear.

It was the whole story of how Alfred, the adventurer, was expelled from his party.

Feeling somewhat sorry for Alfred, Reg speaks to him in order to comfort him at least.

And so the story begins.
>
